  • Constructor Details

    • BlockStream

      public BlockStream​(@NonNull User user, @NonNull org.bukkit.Material material, double range, int speed)
      The maximum speed is 100 and represents movement of 1 block per tick. Example: A speed of 75 means that the stream will advance 15 (75/100 * 20) blocks in a full cycle (20 ticks). We multiply speed steps by 100 to allow enough control over speed while ensuring accuracy.
